Class oracle.html.ImageMap

Class oracle.html.ImageMap 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Container
           |
           +----oracle.html.ImageMap
public class ImageMap
extends Container
Description:

The ImageMap class encapsulates a client-side image map element.
Note that this is not part of standard HTML yet.

Example: 

// Create a new ImageMap (named "map1")
ImageMap map = new ImageMap("map1");
// Specify a circular region which, when clicked, will lead to "index.html"
map.addArea(new ImageMapArea("CIRCLE", "107,153,80", "index.html"));
// Create a new Image object that uses ImageMap named "map1"
Image img = new Image(img,"alternative test",IVAlign.NONE, false, "#map1"));

See Also:
ImageMapArea, Image

Creates a client side image map object
